title: MEGALODON Episode - Week 12 Matchups, Starts, Turkey Day Awards & More! - Fantasy Football Podcast for 11/24
description:
THE MEGALODON SHOW IS HERE! The Fantasy Footballers are back with a Week 12 fantasy football Thanksgiving feast! On today’s fantasy football podcast, get a breakdown for ALL Week 12 matchups! Plus, Starts of the Week, Buy or Sell, Turkey Day Awards, and tons more! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast -- Fantasy Football Podcast for November 24th, 2021.
  
 (06:10) - Buy or Sell
 (10:35) - News & Notes
 (22:40) - Never Not Working
 (33:45) - Turkey Day Awards
 (41:15) - Bears at Lions
 (43:25) - Raiders at Cowboys
 (48:05) - Bills at Saints 
 (53:45) - Starts of the Week
 (53:55) - QB Starts of the Week
 (56:40) - RB Starts of the Week
 (59:35) - WR Starts of the Week
 (01:01:45) - TE Starts of the Week
 (01:04:30) - Boom Boom Kicker of the Week
 (01:06:40) - Fantasy Forecast
 (01:06:45) - Steelers at Bengals
 (01:12:00) - Buccaneers at Colts
 (01:18:15) - Panthers at Dolphins
 (01:22:00) - Titans at Patriots
 (01:27:20) - Eagles at Giants 
 (01:32:30) - Falcons at Jaguars
 (01:36:25) - Jets at Texans
 (01:40:50) - Chargers at Broncos
 (01:44:40) - Rams at Packers
 (01:50:55) - Vikings at 49ers
 (01:56:30) - Browns at Ravens
 (02:00:55) - Seahawks at Washington Football Team
 (02:03:40) - Fantasy Faceoff & Wheel of Shame
 (02:10:45) - Mailbag
